original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasārammaṇo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasārammaṇo
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
